title.rendered: Technology For Faculty and Staff: Account Setup

content.rendered:
Faculty & Staff Account Setup

  • Getting a La Verne Email account
  • Connecting to the La Verne network
  • Getting a La Verne Portal account to check your class rosters, submit student grades, advise students, and view your class schedules online
  • Using the phone system and setting up your voicemail
